name: Bow of Frost
description: A magical bow that shoots icy arrows.
looks: The bow is made of polished wood with intricate ice crystals embedded in the limbs. The string is made of woven ice fibers.

special_effects.freeze: Arrows have a chance to freeze the target, slowing them down.

name: Healing Potion
description: A potion that restores a small amount of health.
looks: The potion is a small glass vial filled with a bright blue liquid that seems to glow with a gentle light.

name: Glowing Pendant
description: A radiant pendant that emits a soft, enchanting glow
looks: The pendant is made of a sparkling crystal that is encased in a silver setting. It hangs from a delicate silver chain.

special_effects.light_blessing: Increases the chance of finding rare items

name: Frozen Wand
description: A magical wand that freezes enemies with its icy powers.
looks: The wand is made of translucent ice, shimmering with a soft blue light. It is adorned with small snowflake-shaped crystals.

special_effects.frostbite: Has a chance to freeze enemies upon successful hit, immobilizing them for a short duration.

name: Staff of Healing
description: A magical staff that radiates healing energy.
looks: The staff is made of polished white wood and glows with a soft golden light. It has intricate carvings of vines and flowers, symbolizing growth and rejuvenation.

special_effects.healing_wave: Can unleash a wave of healing energy, healing all nearby allies.

name: Staff of the Elements
description: A mystical staff that channels the power of the elements.
looks: The staff is made of a gnarled oak branch with intricate carvings of elemental symbols. Each end of the staff is adorned with a glowing gemstone, representing the different elements.

special_weapon_skills.elemental_mastery: Increases the damage of elemental spells by 20%.
special_weapon_skills.staff_handling: Improves staff handling and increases damage with staffs.

special_effects.elemental_nova: Unleashes a powerful burst of elemental energy, damaging all nearby enemies.

name: Ruby Ring
description: A beautiful ring adorned with a large ruby gemstone.
looks: The ring is made of polished silver and features an intricately designed setting that holds a vibrant red ruby. The gemstone catches the light and shimmers with a fiery glow.

name: Axe of the Burning Legion
description: A fearsome axe wielded by the commanders of the Burning Legion.
looks: The Axe of the Burning Legion is a massive, double-bladed weapon that radiates a dark and fiery aura. The blades are adorned with demonic engravings, and the handle is wrapped with infernal leather.

special_weapon_skills.Demon Weapon Mastery: Increases damage with demonic weapons by 30%.

special_effects.Burning Blood: Releases waves of fire upon successful hit, causing additional fire damage to nearby enemies.

name: Staff of Healing
description: A staff infused with healing magic, capable of mending wounds and restoring vitality.
looks: The staff is made of polished maple wood and has a crystal orb at the top. The orb glows with a soft, soothing light.

special_effects.healing_pulse: Periodically emits a pulse of healing energy, restoring nearby allies' health.

name: Shield of Protection
description: A sturdy shield that provides excellent defense against attacks.
looks: The shield is made of reinforced steel with a polished surface. It has a golden emblem of a shield in the center.
